question: My 3yr old has NOT been diagnosed with diabetes.  At this time I *only* suspect she may have some type of blood sugar issue.My question is for those of you that experience a urine odor.  What is it like??  My 3 yr old daughter's urine is incredibly foul.  It literally smells like a nasty men's bathroom at a truck stop.  I guess that could be a stale or old urine smell??I have six children, and she is the ONLY child to have this issue.  It smells so strong in the morning, it about makes me sick!Thanks for any insight you may have.  All the tests show "normal" at this point, so my hunches may be way off!Rebecca
title: Urine odor
